code: import axios from"axios";import{getUserDetails}from"../util/GetUser";const authHeaders=()=>{var _getUserDetails;let userToken=(_getUserDetails=getUserDetails())===null||_getUserDetails===void 0?void 0:_getUserDetails.token;return{headers:{Authorization:userToken}};};const createToDo=data=>{return axios.post("/api/todo/create-to-do",data,authHeaders());};const getToDo=userId=>{return axios.get("/api/todo/get-all-to-do/".concat(userId),authHeaders());};const deleteToDo=id=>{return axios.delete("/api/todo/delete-to-do/".concat(id),authHeaders());};const updateToDo=(id,data)=>{return axios.patch("/api/todo/update-to-do/".concat(id),data,authHeaders());};const ToDoServices={createToDo,getToDo,deleteToDo,updateToDo};export default ToDoServices;
